name: Classic Cheeseburger
description: A juicy beef patty topped with cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles.

name: Pepperoni Pizza Slice
description: A classic slice loaded with pepperoni and gooey mozzarella cheese.

name: Fried Chicken Bucket
description: A bucket of crispy, golden fried chicken pieces, perfect for sharing.

name: Chicken Nuggets
description: Bite-sized crispy chicken nuggets with a side of dipping sauce.

name: French Fries
description: Crispy, golden French fries seasoned to perfection.

name: Spicy Chicken Sandwich
description: A spicy fried chicken breast served with lettuce, pickles, and mayo.

name: Veggie Wrap
description: A healthy wrap filled with fresh veggies, hummus, and avocado.

name: Bacon Cheeseburger
description: A beef patty topped with crispy bacon, cheddar cheese, and special sauce.

name: Fish Tacos
description: Freshly grilled fish wrapped in soft tortillas with cabbage slaw and lime.

name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
description: A pizza topped with BBQ sauce, grilled chicken, and red onions.

name: Loaded Nachos
description: Crispy tortilla chips topped with melted cheese, jalapenos, and salsa.

name: Chocolate Milkshake
description: A rich and creamy chocolate milkshake topped with whipped cream.
